text: is a Japanese actress and singer. She appeared in more than twenty movies from 1950 to 1964. She was married to director Tatsumi Kumashiro from 1955 to 1967. Her best known roles were in Repast (1951) and in Seven Samurai (1954). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Yukiko Shimazaki
